title: Hey Riot Read this
body: i love the tribunal system (not realy) i think if you leave mid game the should be a reason to say or at least use and appeal system on why you left. not every one has great connection or sense of time but i still think there should be and option to at least explain why. im currently permanently suspended for leaving mid game due to a private family matter (team could of ended it but didn't want to surrender  at 30 mins when it was 39-24 or something like that) i had asked them to surrender at least twice or rush the game since we could barley kill the weakest enemy champ. i think you guys need an appeal system or something in place because this a bull shit  a year ban even though i apologized in global chat to the team for leaving and said the i had to go.

replies.body:
Our Leaverbuster penalties do not permanently suspend players.  I went ahead and took into your account and I was able to confirmed you were permanently suspended for something else entirely.  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us and we should be able to explain to you the nature of your suspension.

As for your comment about leaving, we completely understand that life can get complicated and crazy.  This is why we never punish players for leaving a single game. We only apply penalties once there is a pattern of consistently leaving games.  Sometimes this is caused due to matters beyond your control, but you are still ruining the gaming experience of up to 9 other players when you do.

I hope this makes sense!  Let me know if you have any other questions!

im just puzzled since it seames like after 2 game left one being an acident and one do to private maters iv got a year ban i was just starting to enjoy this game and beable to play with my friend that are level 30
